businesses.name: Kerwin Interiors Pty Ltd
businesses.business_details: With a passion for design and colour, Kerwin Interiors takes particular interest in making work areas functional for the application required.  With over 25 years experience in domestic home offices and commercial fitouts, I launched Kerwin Interiors in 2018.  I provide  personal service and advice with a detailed and organised approach.  Extensive images of previously completed jobs can provide inspiration and I and offer online or personal consultation.
businesses.product_details:
Thoughtfully designed interior fitout for your home and office. Home is the place to be - so consider whether your home office is functional for your work or student's current needs.
Products available include:
* Sit/stand or standard desks â€“ full range of colours to suit your home (over 40 standard colours).
* Fully adjustable chairs - to ensure you are looking after your back.
* Storage solutions (standard or customised) - mobile pedestals, credenzas or hutches to keep yourself organised. 
* Student desks - to give your children a dedicated place to study.
* Entertainment units - to enhance your Netflix viewing!
* Sunscreen or blockout blinds - to control glare and warmth.
businesses.headline: Kerwin Interiors Pty Ltd
